__e: Why can't we just find a normal high-school job?
I couldn't earn much at a regular job.
How come you never had... a "normal" job?
We will walk the way of hell, we aren't normal human beings any longer.
Is it impossible to talk with you like another human being?
We'll treat you as a human only today.
Oh. Patrick, under normal circumstances, I would never tell you what to do or who to see.
Under normal circumstances I'd say, "I told you so."
But in normal circumstances he wouldn't be like this.
I mean, between you and me, yes, but between normal people, it's not the same. It's something else.
They mean well but they have no idea what real people go through.
And this is the kind of thing that a... - a cautious person would not have dreamed of doing.
You're at a party across the country from your real life. No one knows your name.
People just want me to do the things that they're too shit-scared to ask for in their normal life.
I don't know if He has called me to serve Him exclusively... or in everyday life, as a doctor, like you.
She's in a regular room now.
We're now travelling faster than is possible for normal space.
